name: Warfighter - 5.56 MM Field - RoccoÂ
additionalNotes: The Warfighter Nicaragua 5.56 MM Field Toro is mild stick that will put you at ease with every puff. The Warfighter Nicaragua 5.56 MM Field's light-brown Connecticut Shade wrapper surrounds a Nicaraguan binder and the expertly blended filler tobaccos from Colombia and Nicaragua for a very flavorful smoking experience. The Warfighter Nicaragua 5.56 MM Field offers up warm notes of cedar and oatmeal.
